name: Toilets and Ragdolls Really Deluxe
description:
Welcome to Toilets and Ragdolls Really Deluxe!

It is a completely remade version of Toilets and Ragdolls with:

Better graphics.

More levels.

More building materials. (Still not a clone of that one popular building game)

And a lot more!

Mobile support is not available yet if you want to play it on mobile or you just miss the old experience go to: https://silvervariable.itch.io/toilets-and-ragdoll
